greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square root of largest square dividing n-th central binomial coefficient.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[Sqrt@ Max@ Select[Divisors@ Binomial[n, Floor[n/2]], IntegerQ@ Sqrt@ # &], {n, 0, 86}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 04 2016 *)
a[n_] := Times @@ (First[#]^Floor[Last[#]/2] & /@ FactorInteger[Binomial[n, Floor[n/2]]]); Array[a, 100] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 06 2020 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = b = binomial(n, n\2); sqrtint(b/core(b)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 10 2013
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 26 2000
